overview: everything: 11 tools; add -> Adds two numbers together and returns the sum, annotatedMessage -> Demonstrates content annotations with structured metadata, echo -> Echoes back the input message., getResourceReference -> Returns references to MCP resources for testing resource linking, getTinyImage -> Returns a small test image for testing binary content handling, listRoots -> Displays MCP roots information showing available root contexts, longRunningOperation -> Demonstrates progress notifications for operations that take time to complete, printEnv -> Prints environment variables for debugging purposes, sampleLLM -> Tests LLM sampling capabilities by requesting completion from the connected model, startElicitation -> Initiates an interactive elicitation flow to gather information from the user, structuredContent -> Returns structured data in various formats to test content type handling
